_header: He sayeth it was once a clerk / That left the fiend and all his work
_description: Dying Monk sees Dragon, Narratio in Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
HE saise it was ane tyme a clerkþat lefft þe fende and
                    all his werk…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat we mai at oure endinge daieIn heuene wone in gammen
                    & plaie . Amen .
